trans-unit.source: Automatically adds an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint to a service, without requiring configuration, in a managed hosting environment that dynamically activates host instances for the service in response to incoming messages.
This factory provides a way to add an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint to a service without requiring configuration.
The endpoint is added to any other endpoints that are defined in configuration, if any.
The managed hosting environments that support this type of dynamic host activation are Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Process Activation Services (WAS).
To use this factory, specify the WebScriptServiceHostFactory in the `Factory` attribute of the [@ServiceHost](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) directive.

The ASP.NET AJAX endpoint created by this factory is configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>, with all the default settings.
The endpoint is created at an empty address relative to the .svc file.
If service configuration already defines an endpoint at this address, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown and the service fails to start.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory"></xref> class.
Normally, this constructor is called automatically by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] as part of service activation - there is no need to call this method manually.

Creates a derived class of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref> for a specified type of service with a specific base address that can be used to automatically enable ASP.NET AJAX endpoints in certain scenarios.
Normally, this method is called automatically by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] as part of service activation - there is no need to call this method manually.
The type of service to host.
The <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Uri> that contains the base addresses for the service hosted.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref> for the type of service specified with the specified base address.
Another service uses the same base address, or another endpoint is using the same address as the ASP.NET AJAX endpoint that this factory is trying to create.
